channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10289|2024-08-04T22:17:19.848Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20netsparker%20cloud%20scan%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin 1.1.5 and older in the NCScanBuilder.DescriptorImpl#doValidateAPI form validation method allowed attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-10290|2024-08-04T22:17:19.687Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20netsparker%20cloud%20scan%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin 1.1.5 and older in the NCScanBuilder.DescriptorImpl#doValidateAPI form validation method allowed attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-10291|2024-08-04T22:17:19.793Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20netsparker%20cloud%20scan%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin 1.1.5 and older stored credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they could be viewed by users with access to the master file system.
